author: varun
msg: SOLR-7541: Removed CollectionsHandler#createNodeIfNotExists. All calls made to this method now call ZkCmdExecutor#ensureExists as they were doing the same thing (merged from trunk r1679568)

author: veithm
msg: Add macro for validators static get function
The static Get function in the validator classes was a code
duplicate. It has been extracted into a macro which can then
by used by the different validator classes.

author: veithm
msg: Add macro for validator cache implementation
Most of the validators use a cache. This cache looks the same in
all of the validator classes. In preparation of reduce these code
duplications a macro gets added to the validator base class which
can be used by the derived validator classes.

author: veithm
msg: Reset Class2Type and Type map on runtime shutdown
When the runtime gets closed also the static type maps should
be cleaned in order to allow a second life cycle within one

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-6464: add expert AnalyzingInfixSuggester.lookup method that accepts arbitrary BooleanQuery to filter contexts
